# Key Dates

```{r, echo=F, results=F, message=F, warning=F}
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(stringr)

tidy_kable <- function(data){
  
  if(ncol(data) == 3){
    tbl <-
      kable(data, col.names = c("", "Date", "Notes")) |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"),
                full_width = F) |> 
   column_spec(column = 1:2, width = "7cm")
    
  }
  
  if(ncol(data) == 2){
    tbl <-
      kable(data, col.names = c("", "Date")) |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"),
                full_width = F) |> 
   column_spec(column = 1:2, width = "5cm") 
    
  }
  
  return(tbl)
  
}

submission_dates <- 
  read_excel("data/key_dates.xlsx",
             sheet = "Submissions") |> 
  mutate(Date =  replace_na(Date, "TBA"))
#, Item = ifelse(Item == "Call", "Opens", Item)) 

registration_dates <- 
  read_excel("data/key_dates.xlsx", sheet = "Registration") |> 
  separate(col = "Item", sep = "\\s+(?=\\S*$)", into = c("Item1", "Item2")) |> 
  mutate(across(.cols = c(Item1, Item2),
                .fns = str_to_title))

```

## Invited Sessions

```{r echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
submission_dates |> 
  filter(Type == "Invited Sessions") |>
  select(Item, Date) |> 
  tidy_kable()
```


## Short Courses

```{r echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
submission_dates |> 
  filter(Type == "Short courses") |>
  select(Item, Date) |> 
  tidy_kable()
```

## Abstract Submissions

```{r echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')

submission_dates |> 
  filter(Type == "Abstracts") |>
  select(Item, Date, Notes) |> 
  tidy_kable() |> 
  column_spec(3, color = "red", bold = T)
```

